data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during TRITON cruise from Long Bay Jamaica to Spithead started at 1795-08-05
Ship: Triton (6th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Long Bay Jamaica - Spithead, 1st Observer: Scory Barker (Captain), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 28G 617BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
